text: Daniel Colliard (14 August 1930 â€“ 3 January 2022) was a French politician. He was a member of the French Communist Party (PCF). He was born in Dieppe, France. He was Mayor of Le Havre from 1994 until 1995. He was a member of the French National Assembly between 1993 until 1997. Colliard died on 3 January 2022 in Le Havre, aged 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French mayors Category:French communists Category:People from Seine-Maritime Category:Politicians from Normandy
title: Daniel Colliard
